title: Number of Ways to Wear Different Hats to Each Other
content:
There are  people and 40 types of hats labeled from 1 to 40.
Given a list of list of integers , where  is a list of all hats preferred by the  person.
Return the number of ways that the n people wear different hats to each other.
Since the answer may be too large, return it modulo .
 








 






 contains a list of unique integers.
